brand.name: Mafi Restaurant
brand.shortDescription: A modern restaurant offering signature Ethiopian and international dishes, plus elegant meeting halls for events.

reservations.howToBook: Use the /booking page or call us for assistance.
reservations.emailTemplateHint: We’ll open your email client pre-filled; just send to confirm.

meetingHalls.summary: Five halls: one large (~200 guests) and four smaller (~50 each).

catering.notes: On-site and event catering available. Custom menus by request.

signature.title: Mixed Grill
signature.description: Mixed lamb, chicken, sausage, steak served with roasted tomatoes and fries, topped with red wine sauce.

signature.title: Roast Chicken
signature.description: Roasted boneless chicken legs with fries and seasonal vegetables, topped with tomato garlic butter sauce.

signature.title: Beef or Chicken Fajita
signature.description: Sliced beef or chicken with peppers and onions; served with sides.

signature.title: Rolled Beef
signature.description: Beef roll stuffed with ricotta and spinach, served with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

signature.title: Fish & Chips
signature.description: Crispy tilapia, fries, and tartar sauce.

signature.title: Fish Cutlet
signature.description: Breaded fish fillet with sweet & sour sauce, served with mashed potatoes and vegetables.

signature.title: Grilled Fish
signature.description: Grilled tilapia or Nile perch with spinach & parsley potatoes; garlic lemon butter or sweet & sour sauce.

signature.title: Stuffed Chicken Breast
signature.description: Spinach & ricotta stuffed chicken breast with curry rice and vegetables; creamy white wine sauce.

notes: Please inform us of allergies or dietary requirements.

booking: Booking requests are pending until confirmed by staff.
Email confirmation includes deposit details if applicable.
allergens: Please disclose allergies; we take precautions but cannot guarantee 100% allergen-free.

faqs.a: Yes. One large hall (~200 guests) and four small halls (~50 each). Book via /booking or call us.

faqs.q: How do I make a reservation?
faqs.a: Use the /booking page for meeting halls, or call us for restaurant table reservations.
